description: Toggle auto delivering of items.

Enemies that attack Tiny have a 20% chance of being stunned for 1.0 second and taking 100 damage. Affects enemies within 400 range of him. Procs after an attack impacts, and does not affect spell immune enemies.
Cause roots to burst from the ground, immobilizing the target enemy unit and causes them to take more damage from attacks. Enemies can still move and attack while entangled.
Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus movement speed
language.lore: Riki comes for you.
notes: Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within 1100 range of the target position once every 0.25 for 4.0 seconds.
language.lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.
language.lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.

description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
language.lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.

description: Ejects the swallowed allied hero inside of you.
language.lore: Allies emerge forever changed.

description: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a %AbilityCastRange% range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.

Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 30% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200 range of each other.
language.lore: Does this bite look infected?
notes: Wolf Bite cooldown matches the cooldown of the current level of Shapeshift.

description: Dispels negative buffs and grants you bonus attack speed. Has an increased effect during the night.
language.lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.

description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
language.lore: The Protectors don't often come into vision; their natural state being nestled within their leafy brethren.

description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
language.lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.
notes: Arrow base damage pierces magic immunity.
Frost Arrows' damage and slow do not pierce magic immunity.

language.displayName: Lil' Shredder Uses 100% of Your Attack Damage

description: Deals 30 damage to all units within 1200 range every second.
Roshan calls a group of Roshlings to aid him.
Roshan launches a number of slow moving fireballs at all nearby enemies.
Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.
Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.
Enemy units in range of Sand Storm have their movement speed slowed by 35% and miss 35% of their attacks.

language.displayName: +0% Hunter In The Night Movement Speed
+20 Movespeed Aura to Beastmaster and his units
description: The Movespeed Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.
Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.
Reduces the enemy target size and lowers their max health by 20% for 6 seconds.
Creates a line of 8 Serpent Wards.
Cancel the Primal Split.

Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

language.displayName: +20 Finger of Death Damage Per Kill

description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3s. Restores 35% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Fires a dart at the target enemy, putting them to sleep.  The target will wake up at the end of the duration or if they take too much damage. Upon waking up, the target takes damage and is slowed.
Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack. Enemies hit are slowed for 4.0 seconds and are damaged for a percent of their max health plus a base amount every 1 second for 4.0 seconds.
Covers an enemy in ink for 6 seconds, slowing their attack speed by 50, movement speed by 25 and dealing a total of 320 damage over its duration.
End your Focus Fire early.
Creates a 650 AoE pool of poison at the target location, dealing another instance of Poison Nova damage and slows by 20%. If an enemy dies in the area, a Plague Ward is spawned.
Creates an icy path towards the targeted direction, allowing you to move faster and path freely. Enemies walking over this path will move slower.
Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

language.displayName: +250 Max Health Aura to Beastmaster and his units
description: The Max Health Aura is global, persists through death, and affects Beastmaster and all units under his control.
Also provides 50% magic resistance while Debuff Immune.
Allows Ice Wall to be cast as a Vector Target ability with {s:bonus_vector_cast_range} cast range.
Attacks inflict critical damage.

language.displayName: +1.5s Solar Bind Stun when target is fully slowed

description: Creates a larger circle of trees in a 300 AoE for 6 seconds. Ensnares enemies inside for 2 seconds, dealing 150 damage per second.

Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.
Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.
Deals impact damage, then slows the target and causes them to miss some attacks. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.
language.shardDescription: Silken Bola becomes an area of effect spell and increases miss chance.

description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.
Chooses the location you will land when Telekinesis finishes.

Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.
notes: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 1000 area of effect to receive Fire Shield.

description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and are stunned while in the air and an additional amount of time after landing.
Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.
Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
language.lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.
language.shardDescription: Omniknight is healed for %bonus_heal_pct% of the damage dealt by Hammer of Purity. Every %bonus_attack_cooldown% seconds, his next attack will fire a Hammer of Purity at the target.

description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.
Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

Reduce movement speed of an enemy by 30% for 6 seconds and provide true sight vision over them. If Slark pounces on the enemy during that time, he will be rewarded with 75 Attack Speed for the duration of the Leash.

language.displayName: Brain Sap Pure and Pierces Immunity

description: Grants Storm Spirit and allied heroes within 750 AoE of him 3 Overload charges. Provides 40 Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 35.0 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3.0 seconds. Max power is reached after 1100 distance moved.
Disarms and slows movement speed of nearby enemies.
Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

language.displayName: Corrosive Hazed targets leave Puddle trails
description: Trails are {s:bonus_puddle_radius} units wide and last {s:bonus_puddle_duration} seconds

Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain 50% of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal
Flies towards the target enemy, dealing damage and rooting it.
When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.
Evasion works even when heroes are visible
Enemies damaged by Sonic Wave are forced to run away from Queen of Pain for 1.5 seconds.
Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.
Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

language.displayName: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form
+25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed
description: Affects Allies positively and Enemies negatively

language.displayName: +120 Psi Blades Attack and Spill Range
+70 Max Health Per Finger of Death Kill

description: Also reduces cooldown of Unrefined Fireblast

language.displayName: Song of the Siren heals allies 7% Max HP/s
+1 Agility gain/stolen per Essence Shift Stack

description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each charge stacks independently.

language.displayName: +10 Upheaval Attack Speed per second on Allies
description: Maximum of +70 Attack Speed

language.displayName: 2 Moon Glaives fired on Lucent Beam
description: Does not fire Glaives on Beams from Eclipse
Harpy Scout gains flying movement at the cost of movement speed. Consumes mana while active.
Kobolds are adept at finding gold, increasing nearby allied heroes' GPM.
When Hellbear dies, all nearby allies go into a frenzy gaining attack speed for a short amount of time.
When Hellbear Smasher dies, all nearby allies go into a rampage gaining bonus attack damage for a short amount of time.
Provides bonus Heal Amplification to all nearby allies.
attributes: Provides bonus Heal Amplification to all nearby allies.%Description%

description:
Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for 3.5 seconds to teleport to the other side. Allies that pass through the portal temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Portals have to be at least 2000 away from each other.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base, in front of your fountain.
language.lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
language.aghanimDescription: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals.

description: The Wildwing Ripper calls on the spirit of the wind, creating a hurricane that can push a unit in the direction of Wildwing Ripper's choice.

Broodmother may create up to 5 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered. Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
language.lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

description: Every third attack Kobold Soldier will disarm its target temporarily. Attack counter doesn't increase while ability is on cooldown.

language.displayName: Half Track Bonus Speed to Allies

description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for 3 seconds.
language.lore: Such revolutionary brilliance was meant to be shared.

description: Ogre slowly charges a big attack stunning for 2.4 seconds and dealing 200 / 250 / 300 / 400 + 8% of their current HP as damage to all units in front of him.

Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.
language.lore: A steady bomb hand prefers an abundance of personal space.
language.shardDescription: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

description: Silences target unit.
Whenever Hill Troll Berserker attacks a unit it applies break to it.
Skeleton's allies gain bonus attack damage. This Aura stacks.
The Giant Wolf's ferocious roar reduces all nearby enemies total attack damage.
Grants Debuff Immunity to the target, as well as bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs on them.
language.lore: The All Seeing One casts down his protection over those that Purist calls friend.

language.displayName: +2.5% Wild Axes Damage Amp Per Stack

description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.
notes: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.

description: Damage is changed to Pure
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3 seconds.
Reinforced Units and Buildings Deal Bonus Damage to other Reinforced Units and Buildings and take less attack damage from other units.
Piercing Units Deal Bonus Damage to non-hero, non-heavy units and reduced damage to heroes and heavy units.
Runty Units Deal reduced damage to hero units.

Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration. At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.aghanimDescription: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 2 charges that replenish every 60 seconds.
notes: Can be cast on invulnerable units.
Negative buffs are continously removed from the target for the duration of the Cleanse.

language.displayName: +2% Astral Spirit Move Speed Per Hero

description: This slot will be replaced with abilities acquired using Death Pact.
The Rock Golem's imposing figure makes enemies more susceptible to Physical Damage.
The Black Drakes' gaze make enemies more susceptible to Spell Damage.

language.displayName: Press the Attack grants 1.5s Debuff Immunity
description: Also increases magic resistance by 50%%
Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.
language.lore: Through mixture of the astral and the atmospheric, Nerif bends a single reality into paradoxical alignment.

description: Whenever Dazzle Casts a Spell, all other abilities currently on cooldown have their cooldowns reduced.
language.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.
language.aghanimDescription: Good Juju reduces all item Cooldowns by 50% and becomes an active ability that can be cast on allied units to refresh all item cooldowns.

description: Hucks a seed at a target, slowing and damaging it. The seed can bounce multiple times to nearby targets.
Coming from a different era, the Frostbitten Golem has an innate control of time, speeding up the cooldowns of all nearby allies.
The Ice Shaman chucks a blue flame towards an enemy unit or building, dealing damage over time.

Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100 cooldown penalty.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
language.lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.

description: Provides the Brewling with phased movement and bonus Status Resistance.
Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
language.lore: A natural defense equally suited to keeping anything from unwanted sisters to snarling hellbeasts at bay.

description: Sacrifice the life of this unit to heal an ally or damage an enemy with the current level of Hand of God.

language.displayName: Hand of God applies a Strong Dispel

description: Slides backward, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal 50% of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range 75% of Ravage's radius.

language.displayName: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler
Spells deal {s:bonus_bonus_spell_damage} more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

description: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, the ally can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Non-targeted effects can still affect the hitched ally. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by 200.
language.lore: The needs of Bradwarden's ample pride pale greatly in the face of his demand for victory.

description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.
Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds and splattering everyone in a 1200 AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
language.lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.
notes: Cannot be used while Leashed or Rooted.

description: Applies a weak poison that minorly slows and deals damage to its target. If this poison is dispelled in any way, the target will receive a large amount of damage and be stunned.
language.lore: As Venomancer's own origins corroborate, some of Jidi's most horrifying dangers become apparent only with time.

description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting the first targeted enemy hero spell in a radius towards him. Effect ends when the first spell is redirected.
language.lore: Barathrum's unyielding focus forms a pocket of planar convergence from which not even the most powerful arcane energies can escape.

description: Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him.
Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.
language.lore: The Beast's single-minded focus on chosen prey leaves all other considerations scattered in his ruinous wake.

description: Begins the rush to the specified location.

Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.
language.lore: As the only member of his species to arrive on this world, locals can only speculate on the Beast's size relative to his kin. Such observation would prove easier of course if the subject didn't eat everything it sees and destroy most of what it doesn't.

description: The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar.
When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for 7 seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.
language.lore: Already draped in a broken patchwork of barding and chains upon appearing in the mistwoods, the Beast tolerates no further attempts at subjugation.
language.aghanimDescription: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases 3 waves of 2 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Each consecutive hit deals bonus damage. Lasts 2.3 seconds.
language.lore: Though none are certain whether his utterances have true meaning, most concede the Beast's powerful grip and tendency to smash his enemies into naught but pulp and pieces communicates his intent well enough.

description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
language.lore: Though powerful, Nature's Prophet's gifts do not include all-sight, and he must rely heavily upon reconnaissance and aid from a long-standing network of stalwart friends.

description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within 675 range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.4s between hits after 20 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.
language.lore: Nature's rage is timeless, and for those who know the secrets, it's easy to stir the echoes of ire that rejoiced in the downfall of Slom.

description: Order all hawks to dive bomb the selected target
CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to %AbilityChannelTime% seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a 1400 range towards her at a speed of 200.
language.lore: Even the youngest Slithereen are well schooled in trawling for prey with nothing but their wits and nets.

description: +{s:bonus_attack_range_bonus} Attack Range when attacking an enemy affected by Poison Touch

language.displayName: +10 All Stats per hero hit with Reverse Polarity
description: Bonus Stats last for {s:bonus_stat_buff_duration}s

language.displayName: +85% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form
+15% Mystic Snake Turn and Movement Speed Slow
+25% Hunter in the Night Status Resistance
Refraction Can Be Cast While Disabled
Enrage provides half benefits to allies in a 700 radius
Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s
description: The second plasma field does {s:bonus_second_ring_reduction}% less damage
Add a partial outer ring to Dissimilate
Glaives of Wisdom Bounce to targets withing a {s:bonus_bounce_range} range.
When Venomous Gale impacts enemy Heroes, it creates {s:bonus_create_wards} Plague Wards around them.
The Flagbearer inspires all allies, granting them bonus health regeneration.
Does not reveal Wards
Creates a row of hedges in front of Nature's Prophet that blocks incoming enemy attack projectiles. Slows and damages enemies that are too close to the Hedgerow.
Deals damages to the enemy equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx in the past 15s.

Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.
Load an ally into the nearest available tombstone.

Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a 600 radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains 50% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.
When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.
Zeus gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

language.displayName: No Damage Penalty Distance For Tempest Double

description: Nature's Prophet gains a stack of bonus attack damage for every 2 trees around him. Every attack reduces the stacks of attack damage, but increases Nature's Prophet's armor.
Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength. Increases Multicast chance by 1% for each 20 Strength Ogre has.

Alchemist coats his weapons with an acid that applies a stacking slow and status resistance reduction to enemies hit. Slow and Status resistance increases when Alchemist is under the effect of Chemical Rage.
Pulls the target and the Void Brewling in the target direction. Enemies are damaged upon arrival.

Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for 5 seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Burning Army Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

When the Tar Bomb hits, any Burning Army skeletons within attack range will attack the target.

Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Burning Skeleton Archers skeletons within a 1200 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 50 / 55 / 60 / 65% of the attack speed bonus.

Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.

Drow Ranger creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow Ranger additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow Ranger. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast
Every time an enemy hero is damaged by an ability, Magnus gains a stacking buff, that provides 6 Strength per stack.

language.displayName: Cannot be slowed or rooted during Trample

description: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.
Applies Shadow Walk and all of it's bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is 1.0s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.
Arc Warden takes the position of his Tempest on cast, destroying it in the process, and recovers Arc Warden for 50 of its remaining health and mana
Every strike increases the damage of subsequent strikes until the debuff expires

Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead. Any time a spell is reflected by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.

Grabs the Target Ally, Enemy or Rune, and uncontrollably drags them towards Lone Druid for the duration. Enemies receive damage every 0.5s. When dragging a unit, they are Rooted and the Spirit Bear is slowed by 0%.
Lightning Storm hits a random enemy in Pulse Nova radius every {s:bonus_pulse_nova_lightning_interval}s with a single bolt. Prioritizes heroes.
Detonate Reactive Tazer immediately.
When facing the team that last killed him, Roshan will release an angry roar, heard everywhere on the map, that damages everyone in a 900 AoE and increases their incoming damage by 25%

language.displayName: +150% Crit On Targets Affected By Dragon Slave
description: Only applies to Lina's attacks

language.displayName: +2/0.01 Dumb Luck Mana/Mana Regen Per Strength
Fortune's End Heals/Damages for 60 Per Effect Dispelled
Wave Of Terror Steals 20% Of Reduced Damage And Armor

description: Shortly after dying, a burst of magic damage based on the max health of the imp is dealt to all enemies in a small area. Does 50% less damage to non-hero targets.
Passively grants a regenerating All Damage Barrier. Armor can not go below 0.
Reflects damage received evenly to the attacker and all other heroes within 1200 radius
CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
language.lore: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

description: Damage done by direct attacks.
Improves all attributes per point spent
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.
attributes: MOVE SPEED SLOW ON FULL DRAIN: 25% / 30% / 35% / 40%
language.lore: A modified technique of the Turstarkuri monks' peaceful ways is to turn magical energies on their owner.
notes: Mana Break has 50% effect if caused by illusions.

description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
language.lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.
notes: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.

description: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.
language.lore: Years of meditation and obsession with revenge have hardened Anti-Mage's skin against mystical opponents.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other spell resistance sources.

description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.
language.lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.
notes: Damage is calculated based on the primary target's mana, but applied to all enemies within the area of effect.

description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him at high speed, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
language.lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
language.aghanimDescription: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.

description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
language.lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
language.aghanimDescription: Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor and grants Axe armor per affected target.
notes: Destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.

description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
language.lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
notes: Counter Helix triggers when the attack hits.
language.shardDescription: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown.

description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
language.lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
notes: Culling Blade death cannot be prevented with other abilities like Shallow Grave.

description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
language.lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.
language.shardDescription: Reduces cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%. Causes Brain Sap to become a  AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for .

description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
language.lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
language.lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.
language.aghanimDescription: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take  incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage nightmared targets freely with bonus attack speed.
language.lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.
notes: In the first second of Nightmare, the unit is invulnerable.
Bane can wake himself from Nightmare.
On cast, replaced with Nightmare End: Ends all ongoing Nightmares on any affected units.

description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
language.lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.
notes: Damage dealt to Bloodseeker or allies is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
language.shardDescription: Bloodrage attacks now deal 30 pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
language.lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.
notes: Total time is a 2.6 second delay plus a 0.3 second cast time.

description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
language.lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
notes: Not triggered by Illusions.
Max movement speed bonus occurs when an enemy's health is at or below 25%.
Effects linger for 4.0 seconds if a target dies.

description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
language.lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
language.lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.
language.aghanimDescription: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.
notes: The slow duration is refreshed on successive casts.

description: Stops all enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
language.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.
notes: Doesn't stop usage of items.

description: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.
language.lore: Traxex' time spent alone in the forests of her Drow home has allowed her to teach other archers how to improve their bow skills.

description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility, with allies receiving 50% of the bonus Drow receives. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400 range.
language.lore: The Drow Ranger is the epitome of archery prowess.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting up to 0 nearby units within a 375 range normal attacks that deal reduced damage.
notes: Marksmanship procs have true strike.

description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
language.lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
notes: Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
language.shardDescription: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.
language.lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
language.aghanimDescription: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.

description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
language.lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.

description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
language.lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
language.lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.

description: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Juggernaut deals damage in an interval equal to 2.0x his attack speed
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
notes: You can use items during Blade Fury.
Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.
language.shardDescription: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by %bonus_movement_slow%.

description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25.0 seconds.
language.lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
notes: The Healing Ward can be controlled.
Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
notes: You can use items during Omnislash.

description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
language.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.
notes: The initial bubble effect is only visible to allies and provides vision in fog of war.
Units tossed in the air will be stunned and still able to be attacked.

description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
language.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
language.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.
notes: Interrupts channeling spells.

description: Returns the marked hero to the X.

Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
language.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.
notes: Damage dealt after Rum wears off is non-lethal and can never kill a hero.
Actual area of effect of ship's collision is larger than the boat itself.
The boat has a movement speed of 650.

description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path and burns them over time.
language.lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.

description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
language.lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.

description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18 seconds.
language.lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
notes: Duration refreshes each time an opponent is hit with a spell.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
language.shardDescription: Lina's abilities deal %shard_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage. Temporarily Supercharges Lina giving her 10 stacks of Fiery Soul.
language.lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.

description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
language.lore: The Demon Witch exercises his demonic covenant, opening a fissure from hell.
notes: The spikes move at 2800 units per second.

description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
language.lore: Lion is compelled to share his transfiguration, twisting the essence of those who oppose him.
notes: Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 120, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

description: CHANNELED - Channels magical energy, taking mana and slowing enemies over time, and dealing damage equal to 100% of mana stolen. Can target allies to give them mana and movement speed at a 50% rate.
language.lore: Lesser magi are nothing more than a source of magical restoration for the Demon Witch.
notes: Instantly destroys illusions and prevents heroes from going invisible.
language.shardDescription: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to 2 additional enemies and gets +400 additional break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with 0 magic resistance while channeling.

description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
language.lore: Lion's disfigured hand is also the source of his greatest power, capable of flooding victims with malefic force.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
notes: Finger of Death has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.
Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within 3 seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.

description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 2.6 / 3.4 / 4.2 / 5.0 seconds, with bonus damage up to 150 / 160 / 170 / 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
language.lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.
notes: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
language.lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.

description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4 seconds.
language.lore: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
language.shardDescription:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected and guarantees them to be hit with a secondary Starstorm if that spell is cast. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

 Can be put on alt-cast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump. 

Grants 1 bonus charge(s).

description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
language.lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
notes: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
language.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility.
Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
language.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
notes: Projectile moves at 1150 speed.
language.shardDescription: Increases bonus Agility.

description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
language.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
notes: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Agility Gain will also level up Strength Gain.
language.shardDescription: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.

description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
language.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.
notes: Attribute Shift can't convert stats from items.
Leveling up Strength Gain will also level up Agility Gain.
language.shardDescription: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned.

description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
language.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
language.aghanimDescription: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.
notes: You can't target yourself with Morph.
Morph won't copy Shard/Scepter abilities unless Morphling owns the respective item.

description: Toggles Morphling's form between his own and the replicated enemy.

Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
language.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a short distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
language.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground a longer distance away from him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.
language.lore: Nevermore's trademark for harvesting souls.
notes: Stack duration refreshes on stack gain.

description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 30.0% of them from bondage.
language.lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases max souls.
notes: Denies and neutral creeps also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
language.shardDescription: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.

description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by 2 for 20s.
language.lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
language.shardDescription: Lowers nearby enemy magic resistance by 14%.

description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.15. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.
language.lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
language.aghanimDescription: Reduces cooldown and causes Requiem of Souls to return back to Shadow Fiend. The wave back to Shadow Fiend deals less damage, but heals Shadow Fiend for all the damage it dealt.
notes: One line is generated from Shadow Fiend for every 1 soul in his possession.
Fear and movement slow do not apply if the Requiem was released on death.

description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.
language.lore: Azwraith's proficiency at spearing his family's meal of fish is proving quite useful in the battlefield.
language.aghanimDescription: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage.
notes: Nearby illusions will mimic the cast animation.

description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500% bonus damage and deals -80 less damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: Dread Magus Vorn's death imbued the Phantom Lancer with the ability to bend and fracture all spectrums of light.
notes: This ability can be used to dodge projectiles, and dispel debuffs.
Trees near a reappearing unit will be destroyed.
Phantom Lancer and his allies can see which illusion is the 100% damage illusion.

description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4 seconds.
language.lore: Each of Azwraith's lance attacks feels like two from a normal warrior; or three; or four...
notes: Illusions created by Juxtapose will attack the target that the ability was triggered upon.
language.shardDescription: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15 during this invisibility.

description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.
language.lore: Azwraith knows that on the field of battle, speed can mean everything.
notes: If the attack order is cancelled, the movement speed bonus is lost.
Rush movement speed is 800.

description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
language.lore: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
notes: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

description: Teleports Puck to a flying Illusory Orb.
Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
language.lore: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
language.aghanimDescription: Waning Rift now has %scepter_radius% radius and range and knocks enemies back %scepter_pushback% distance over %scepter_pushback_duration% seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for %scepter_vision_duration% seconds.

description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
language.lore: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
notes: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
language.shardDescription: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + 200 every time it phase shifts.

description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
language.lore: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
language.aghanimDescription: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked based on Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.

description: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
language.lore: The Butcher gives new meaning to the words 'meat shield.'

description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.
language.lore: The Butcher's hook is a symbolic nightmare, its curved blade a frightening reminder of his slaughterous intent.
notes: Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target if it's an enemy.
Meat Hook hits invisible units.
Meat Hook can go through trees, cliffs, buildings, ancient units and Roshan.
Meat Hook can drag friendly units, but they won't be damaged.
Meat Hook can hit and drag runes to Pudge, refunding the Hook's mana cost.

description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.
language.lore: A foul odor precedes a toxic, choking gas, emanating from the Butcher's putrid, ever-swelling mass.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.
notes: Using Rot doesn't interrupt channeling.
Rot hits invisible units.
If Pudge is silenced, he can't deactivate Rot if it's activated.
Rot self-damage is non-lethal.

description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75 units, up to a minimum of 125 range. Lasts longer on creeps.
language.lore: 'When I'm through with these vermin, they'll be fit for a pie!'
notes: If a unit becomes invisible while Dismembered, it will still be under the effects of Dismember.
language.shardDescription: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.

description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.
language.lore: Originally used to open shows with the travelling con-man, Rhasta's lightning display shocks adversaries in more ways than one.
notes: Can hit secondary targets up to 1000 distance away.

description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities and amplifying the damage they receive.
language.lore: Rhasta often ended performances by turning himself into a chicken - now, the humiliation is shared.
notes: Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.
language.lore: A self-defense incantation, Rhasta developed shackles after his master was slain in the Bleeding Hills.
language.shardDescription: Shackles creates 4 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 75. Serpent wards lasts 6 seconds.

description: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.
language.lore: Snake charming was a big part of the Shadow Shaman's act; now Rhasta can empower the snakes to do his bidding.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.

description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
language.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
language.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.
notes: The link is broken when either unit dies or the distance between them becomes 250 units greater than Static Link's cast range.
language.shardDescription: Increases Cast Range. Allows Static Link to be put on alt-cast to pull Razor and his Target towards at each other at a speed of 0.

description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed. There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
language.lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
language.lore: Ride the lightning.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
notes: Each blast targets the lowest health enemy unit within range.
Eye of the Storm will prioritize striking static linked heroes.
Successive casts of Eye of the Storm will stack.

description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target. Summoned skeletons around the target will receive bonus movement and attack speed for the duration of the debuff.
language.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
notes: If Wraith King has summoned skeletons, casting Wraithfire Blast on a target will order all of the skeletons to attack that target.

description:
Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.

Skeletons deal more damage to heroes and less damage to buildings.

Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.
attributes: Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.
Skeletons deal more damage to heroes and less damage to buildings.
Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.%Description%
Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.%Lore%
Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.%Note0%
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.%Note1%
language.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
notes: Summoned skeletons will automatically attack any unit targeted by Wraithfire Blast.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.

description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
language.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed, and spawn 1 / 2 / 3 skeleton(s) to attack each nearby enemy hero. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
language.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
language.aghanimDescription: Reduces cooldown. If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed and gain bonus attack and movement speed. Heroes who die this way respawn at a faster rate.
notes: Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
language.shardDescription: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and increases Skeleton Spawn count.

description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
language.lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

description: Fires a projectile that slows enemy units in a target area and prevents them from casting spells.
language.lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
notes: Doesn't prevent usage of items.

description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 40 seconds.
Passively grants Movement Speed.
language.lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
language.aghanimDescription: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.
notes: Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.

description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
language.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases cast range and applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If alt-cast, it deals an additional 180 damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.

description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.
language.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10 seconds.
language.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!
language.shardDescription: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants 6 armor and 3 movement speed to all allies near Sven.

description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35.0 seconds.
language.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.
notes: The bonus damage is based on base damage and the primary attribute of Sven.

description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12.0 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
language.lore: Raijin Thunderkeg's duality allows him to admire himself in shocking fashion.
notes: Remnants take 0.75 second to materialize after the spell is cast.
Remnants grant unobstructed vision for their duration.
The explosion actually hits units in a 300 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
language.lore: Raijin's thunderous, boisterous energy often draws others into an electrifying situation.
language.aghanimDescription: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
language.lore: Pow!  Zip!  Zap!
notes: Using items doesn't trigger Overload.
Overload charges do not stack.
language.shardDescription: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+ 7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+ 0.65 of his total mana pool. Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
language.lore: The Storm is coming in.
notes: Abilities and items can be used while traveling.
This ability will destroy trees.
Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.

description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit.
language.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases its cast range. Burrowstrike can be put on autocast to retreat underground for up to 2 seconds, becoming invulnerable and powering up burrowstrike. When that duration is over, Burrowstrike deals up to 2x Burrowstrike damage, depending on the duration of time spent underground.

description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The sandstorm follows Sand King at 100 units per second. The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.
language.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.
language.aghanimDescription: Every 0.2s, 0 Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each measuring 0 of the Sand Storm's current radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.
notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Sand King briefly becomes visible upon attacking or using spells while in Sand Storm. Sand King will become invisible again in 0.7 seconds.

description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.
language.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

description: After a cast point of 2.0 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
language.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
notes: The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
language.shardDescription: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every 3.5s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2x damage to units being tossed.
language.lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
language.lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.
notes: You can toss allies, but they don't take damage.
Toss deals 33% of its damage to buildings.
Debuff Immune units can be targeted but cannot be tossed.

description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
language.lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.
notes: The cooldown begins when the tree is thrown.
language.shardDescription: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.
language.lore: Watching a hill become a mountain is awe-inspiring - especially if the mountain begins laying waste to adversaries.

description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
language.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range. Deals 100% more damage to creeps.
language.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

description: Zeus shocks any enemy that he attacks or is hit by his abilities, causing damage equal to 8% of their current health.
language.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Does a flat amount of damage and additional damage based on the max health of the target.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
language.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.
