language.aghanimDescription: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within 700 range. Heroes will take priority.
notes: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
Spell immune enemies do not count toward the damage distribution.
Mystic Flare will damage enemy creeps if no enemy heroes are present.

description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
language.lore: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.
notes: Abaddon can not kill himself with this skill.

description: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.
notes: The max damage is always dealt whether the barrier is destroyed by expiring or absorbing damage.
The explosion does not damage units hidden by the fog of war.

description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to take damage over time, be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost. Damage over time component to buildings is reduced by 70%.
language.lore: While the baptized draw strength from the Font, the gifts of Avernus are debilitating to the uninitiated.
language.shardDescription: Causes Mist Coil to deal Abaddon's attack damage on impact. Increases Curse of Avernus base slow.

description: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding.  What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525 damage while within 1200 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
notes: Borrowed Time can be manually activated while Abaddon is disabled, but not while silenced.  The passive activation can still occur while silenced.
Aphotic Shield does not block any damage to Abaddon when Borrowed Time is active, allowing him to heal.

description: CHANNELED - Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
language.lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.
notes: If a unit is hit by Astral Spirit and Elder Titan, they will take both instances of damage.
language.shardDescription: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on alt-cast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

description: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.
language.lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.

description: Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.
The Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
language.lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for 2 seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.

description: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
language.lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
notes: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.

description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.
language.lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.

description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage per unit or per hero and granting you bonus attack speed . Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health. Can be cast during Duel.
language.lore: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
language.shardDescription: Gives 0 bonus radius when cast during Duel.

description: Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus movement speed and health regen for a short time.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
language.shardDescription: Press The Attack targets now gain Debuff Immunity for 1.75 seconds. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.

description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
language.lore: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.

description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities, with the exception of Legion Commander being able to cast Overwhelming Odds. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
language.lore: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases Duel duration and reduces cooldown.  Legion Commander and her opponent take reduced damage from other sources.
notes: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
Winning a Duel automatically casts Press the Attack on yourself.
language.shardDescription: Increases Duel damage by 8 per win. Applies retroactively.

description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 500 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1.0 seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within 150 radius and decreases up to 50 on the edge. Deals 30% damage to buildings.
language.lore: The bane of Toterin!
notes: Cannot be placed within 350 AoE of another Proximity Mine.
Proximity Mines do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.
Mines last until they explode or are destroyed.
Mines are triggered by invisible units.
Grants 30 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Spell immune units will reveal mines, but not trigger detonation.

description: Plant an invisible trap that roots nearby enemy units instantly when triggered.
language.lore: The scourge of Trapper Town!
language.aghanimDescription: Increases cast range.
notes: Stasis Traps destroy all other Stasis Traps in their area of effect when they detonate.
Stasis Traps are not triggered by invisible units.
Stasis Traps do not block neutral creep camps from spawning.

description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and stun enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.
language.lore: Where we going?
notes: The self-damage Techies receive from this blast is non-lethal.
This ability destroys trees.
language.shardDescription: Increases Blast Off! cast range by %shard_bonus_cast_range% and applies a %shard_stun_duration% second stun to affected enemies.

description: Plant an invisible explosive that will only detonate after a brief delay when triggered.  Does not damage buildings.
language.lore: The downfall of Dredger's Bight!
language.aghanimDescription: Increases damage and cast range.
notes: Grants 10 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.

description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
language.lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.
notes: Targets are chosen randomly around Xin.
Does not affect Debuff Immune or invisible units.

description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.
language.lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.
notes: Targets are determined when the spell is cast.
A regular attack is done to each target every 0.25 seconds.
Any attack modifier that Xin has (such as Critical Strike, Bash, Cleave, or Orb effects) will be applied normally on these attacks.
Abilities and items can be used while Sleight of Fist is active.

description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that creates a magic damage barrier, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the barrier is broken, the damage is also lost.
language.lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.
notes: Magic damage reduction is calculated before any reductions.
The damage lingers for an additional 0.5 seconds after application.

description: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250% Ember Spirit's speed. Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant. Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.
language.lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
notes: Starts with 3 charges (maximum).
language.shardDescription: Fire Remnants deal damage per second in an area around them. If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
language.lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a 200 radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits. If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. Deals 1.4x damage to creeps.
language.lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 30 + 100% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
language.lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
notes: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
The boulder has a radius of 160.

description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.
language.lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
notes: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Geomagnetic Grip can also target allied creeps.
language.shardDescription: Can now grab allies.

description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location. Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities. Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Gains additional charges every 5 hero levels.
language.lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.
language.shardDescription: Causes Stone Remnant to provide ground vision. Increases the amount of remnants by %shard_tooltip%.

description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
language.lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
language.lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
language.shardDescription: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by the root only every 3.6 seconds.
language.lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.
language.aghanimDescription: Slows enemy movement speed in the Pit of Malice.

description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.
language.lore: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.

description: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's or building's position.  After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location.  Dark Rift can be cancelled at anytime during the cast.  If it is cancelled in this way or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.
language.lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
notes: Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

description: Stop the teleport.
Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.
language.lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
notes: Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions, that will be destroyed if the slow debuff is removed.
Reflections can only attack their source.

description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
language.lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrorblades!
notes: Illusions created by Conjure Image are visually different for enemies.

description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
language.lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
notes: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Terrorblade was in when the item was used.

description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
language.lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
notes: Debuff Immune enemies don't get their HP modified.

description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.
language.lore: Though no stranger to travelling the cosmic void, soaring within an atmosphere offers unique pleasures.
notes: Icarus Dive has a 2.0 second travel duration, and can be cancelled by casting the ability again while in flight.

description: Immediately cancels the dive.
language.lore: SCREE!

description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
language.lore: The ever-collapsing core of Phoenix often emits short-lived bursts of conscious light.
notes: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.
language.shardDescription: Causes Fire Spirits to become a passive charge-based ability. Has 7 second replenish time.

description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire. Enemies are also blinded and get a miss chance that increases as the beam continues to fire.
language.lore: The vent through which such stellar energy flows is mere atoms wide.
notes: Sun Ray has a width of 130 units, and a length of %abilitycastrange% units.
Sun Ray is canceled if Phoenix gets stunned, silenced, cycloned, hexed or slept.
Phoenix can use items and abilities without canceling Sun Ray.
language.shardDescription: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by 10.

description: Immediately stops the Sun Ray.
language.lore: CHIRP!

description: Toggles slow forward movement during Sun Ray firing.
language.lore: SQAWRK!
notes: Sun Ray allows Phoenix to move over cliffs and trees.

description: The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6.0 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: The solar crucible of a Supernova may be fatal, yet from its flames arise new beacons to wander infinity.
language.aghanimDescription: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

description: Each fire spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.
language.lore: PKAWW! BOOM
notes: Fire Spirits reveal the area they strike for 1 second.

description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.
language.lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

description: Detonate all remote mines in the target area.
language.lore: Why light one fuse when you can light them all?

description: Detonate all selected remote mines.
language.lore: Kablooey!

description: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and dispels enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only dispel debuffs. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: The astral orb crackles with power while raw energy lances out, temporarily disrupting an enemy's connection to their own body.
notes: Can be cast on invulnerable units.

description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them if they are an enemy and granting them 100% magic damage resistance if they are an ally.
language.lore: An unbreakable prophecy resounds: a chosen ally shall briefly suffer no magics.  Other kinds of suffering however...
language.aghanimDescription: Fate's Edict no longer causes allies to be disarmed or enemies to be immune to magic damage.

description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.
language.lore: Like a hall of mirrors might amplify the light of a single candle, the shattered walls of the universe can transform the light of prophecy into a burning torch.
notes: The healing from Purifying Flames can be stacked with itself.
The damage from Purifying Flames cannot be lethal to allies.

description: Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: Foes and false prophets oft make lies of men's fates.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15 second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally 25 bonus Spell Damage and 0.25 reduced Base Attack Time.
notes: Delayed damage and healing will take armor and magic resistance reductions into account when received.
The delayed damage and healing takes effect as soon as the target becomes vulnerable.

description: Launch the snowball toward the target.
language.lore: Into the great wide white!
notes: The snowball destroys trees.
Doesn't carry illusions, but will carry Meepo clones and other units that Tusk controls.
Each Meepo clone added to the snowball will add its own bonus damage.

description: Destroys the selected Spin Web.
Plant a warning sign, causing mines within its radius to be invulnerable. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 60 seconds.
language.lore: Watch your step!
language.aghanimDescription: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within 200 units of a minefield sign, the 500 units area around the sign will become a minefield for 10 seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.

description: Launches a second independent Chakram.
language.lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!
notes: The Chakram will return if Timbersaw runs out of mana or moves over 2000.0 distance away.
Slow effects from two chakrams do not stack.

description: Returns the Chakram to Timbersaw.

Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
language.lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
notes: Earth Spirit himself can be targeted by Boulder Smash if he is enchanted.

description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
language.lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.
notes: Being entangled by Overgrowth through enchanted trees from Eyes in the Forest does damage.
If the enemy has True Sight, they will be able to see which trees are enchanted.

description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 4 / 6 / 8 / 10% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400 additional vision range at night while soaring.
language.lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.
notes: Enemy units can only receive the Arctic Burn debuff once per cast.
This ability does not affect Roshan.
Reduces Winter Wyvern's attack point to 0.1.
The damage and slow from Arctic Burn can be dispelled.

description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30%.
language.lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.
notes: The primary projectile moves at 750 movement speed, or reaches the target in 1.0 second, whichever is faster.
The primary projectile cannot be disjointed.

description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
language.lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.
language.shardDescription: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range. Reduces cooldown by 4.0 seconds.

description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of magic damage from Winter Wyvern or her controlled units, that is amplified.
language.lore: The oldest of the bookwurm’s spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.
notes: If the target dies to its allies, Winter Wyvern will receive credit for the kill.
Will only pierce the spell immunity of the primary target, not the target's surrounding allies.
If there are no allies within range of the Cursed enemy for 2.5 seconds the effect will end early.

description: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.
Increases the health capacity of nearby units.

Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mind Flare and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
language.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.
notes: Casting Vendetta will cancel burrow.

description: On death, Mud Golems shatter into several Shard Golems.
Stop.
Hurls a boulder at the target, damaging and stunning them.
language.lore: \"Why do they hesitate? What are they afraid of throwing?\"

description: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.
DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
language.lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?

description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.
language.lore: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.

description: Emerge from the burrow.
language.lore: Some castes of zealot scarab are known to create small burrows to lie in wait, ready to ambush their prey.

description: Morphling creates a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, which can cast all of that hero's current, non-ultimate abilities. Enemies are able to see which unit is a hybrid.
Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.

Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, dealing damage over time. The damage is not applied if another enemy unit is near the target.

Arc Warden:

Slows the target's movement speed.

Tempest Double:

Movement speed slow is decreased, but damage is increased.
language.lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

description:
Arc Warden:

Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

Tempest Double:

Allies gain bonus attack range and deal bonus damage with their attacks. Duration is increased.
language.lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.
language.shardDescription: Magnetic Field pushes enemies out of the area when cast and slows them while they are in it. Also provides allies inside with magic resistance.

description:
Arc Warden:

Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit. Non-hero units receive 40% more damage.

Tempest Double:

Increased Wraith Speed and slow duration, decreased Activation Delay and Damage.
language.lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 2.0 second activation period. The new Spark Wraiths last 15 seconds and has a radius of 225
notes: Spark Wraiths can not be disjointed.

description: The Ancient Black Dragon's dreaded presence grants nearby allies additional armor. This bonus can stack with itself.
The rhythm of the Thunderhide's heartbeat increases the attack speed and accuracy of nearby allies.

Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and special Tempest Double versions of his spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.  The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed. The Tempest Double loses its sense of self if he is too far away from Arc Warden and deals less attack damage.
language.lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
notes: Tempest Double and Refresher Orb cannot be used by the duplicate.

description: Passively grants a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
language.lore: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.
language.aghanimDescription: Damage that would bring Outworld Destroyer below 20 health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to 75 of his maximum mana that lasts for 15 seconds. This effect can occur every 60 seconds and cannot be refreshed.
language.shardDescription: Casting Astral Imprisonment on an ally will trigger Essence Aura on them and grant then 300 max mana for 10 seconds.

description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
language.lore: Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.
notes: Cannot cast multiple on same target.
language.shardDescription: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 1.2 seconds if they are siphoned for 3 seconds consecutively.

description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.
notes: An entangled hero will not be able to move.
Cooldown is shared with Lone Druid.

description: This creature protects its allies with a Magic resistance aura. Creeps are better protected.
Hurls a fire blast on the ground, igniting the area in a 300 radius for 8.0 / 9 / 10 / 12 seconds. Enemies caught in the fire will take 85 damage per second.
Improves all attributes per point spent

Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8 / 9 / 10 / 11 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown. The debuff does not tick down while inside Chronosphere.
language.lore: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.
notes: Does not affect item cooldowns.

description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.
language.lore: The legendary Jingu Bang grows to match its master's will, ensuring no enemy can escape the Monkey King's reach.
notes: Does not affect spell-immune enemies.
language.shardDescription: When Boundless Strike is set to alt-cast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff as soon as Boundless Strike hits the ground, applying Primal Spring with 60 of the max channeling duration power where he lands.

description: Changes Monkey King's shape to deceive opponents, using the environment nearby as inspiration for the disguise. Taking damage, attacking, or using any item or ability breaks Monkey King's disguise. Grants damage immunity for 0.2 seconds upon transforming.
language.lore: Watch out for that tree.
language.shardDescription: Mischief has a shorter cooldown, longer invulnerability period, and disjoints projectiles.

description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.
language.lore: Sun Wukong dances nimbly along the treetop canopy, always just out of arm's reach.
notes: Tree Dance cooldown starts upon landing.
Right-clicking the ground will have Monkey King drop from the tree.

description: Reverts Monkey King's shape to his original form.
Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.
language.lore: Always sensitive to the moods of its master, the Jingu Bang radiates power when Sun Wukong's combat fervor is on full display.
notes: Hitting an enemy with Boundless Strike adds to the hit counter.
Repeatedly hitting an enemy refreshes the Jingu Mastery debuff duration.
Hit charges on enemies cannot be dispelled.
Jingu Mastery buff on self can be dispelled.

description: CHANNELED - Monkey King springs out from his tree perch, damaging and slowing enemies in the area where he lands. Damage and slow amounts are in proportion to channel duration.
language.lore: Leaping from the safety of cover into the midst of his enemies, Sun Wukong attacks without mercy.

description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.
language.lore: Monkey King rips out a tuft of fur to blow at his enemies, charging each strand to transform into a copy of himself.
language.aghanimDescription: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.
notes: Soldiers do not receive Jingu Mastery bonuses.
Soldiers do not copy Basher or Abyssal.

description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.
language.lore: As it was at the beginning, Elder Titan makes it so again.
notes: When the Astral Spirit isn't present, both the armor and magic armor reduction is centered around Elder Titan.

description:
Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

The ricochet damages all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet are feared away from the impact.
language.lore: A steady gunhand and an eternity of practice produce trickshots that defy the mortal mind.
notes: Feared enemies are phased and unslowable.
The ricochet will travel 1.5x Dead Shot's cast range.
Can ricochet off of magic immune targets.

description:
Summons a group of 4 revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed and have reduced attack speed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.

Enemy heroes killed inside the Calling refresh its duration and create another Revenant.
language.lore: Muerta's family are forever beyond the spirit veil, but her deal with Death allows her to briefly call on them in times of want or need.

description: Toggleable. When toggled on, Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target.
language.lore: Muerta offers all of her victims Mercy. Some are fortunate enough to also earn Grace.
notes: If no other units are in range, she fires both guns at the original target.
Secondary shots can hit units within Muerta's attack range plus 175.
The secondary shot can trigger attack modifiers.

description:
Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage. Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

Muerta can attack ethereal units, but deals no damage to Magic Immune targets.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: Muerta sheds her corporeal form, crossing the spirit veil and striking her enemies with the fury of the damned.
notes: Muerta will dodge projectiles upon transformation.
Muerta cannot attack buildings while transformed.
Other ethereal effects will not stop Muerta from being able to attack.
language.shardDescription:
Muerta gains 30 Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.
While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains 2 spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity.

description:
Muerta precisely shoots a hero in their soul, separating it from their physical body and knocking it 150 units away.
The soul is untargetable, muted, disarmed, and invulnerable for 4 seconds.
The body is stunned and has 35% damage reduction for this duration.

After the effect ends the hero's soul is forcefully returned to their body applying a strong dispel. The soul will survive until the end of the effect even if the hero is killed.
notes: Debuff Immune units will take the damage from the shot but not be separated from their body.
Allied heroes hit with Parting Shot will not be damaged.

language.displayName: x1.5x Flesh Heap Stack Str and Damage Block bonuses
+1 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars
description: This effect can stack among multiple sources

language.displayName: 80% Magic Resistance for Chaotic Offering Golems
Magic Missile Damage Becomes Pure And Pierces Debuff Immunity

description: Increases both stun and path duration.

language.displayName: +2% Infernal Blade Max HP As Damage

description: Releases {s:bonus_radial_count} additional Deafening Blasts around Invoker in a circular pattern.  An enemy can only be hit once per cast.
Gives lifesteal and health regeneration to nearby allies.
notes: The aura is stacking.

description: Automatically targets additional enemy units with a mana pool within 400 distance around the original target.
The duration of the stun is not affected.
Launches two extra Stifling Daggers towards random visible enemies within the cast range.

language.displayName: +30% Tricks of the Trade Agility Increase

description: Activate to restore health and mana regeneration over time and gain 50XP for each time the shrine was activated
notes: Right click the Shrine to activate.
Regeneration values increase by +2/1 health/mana per minute.
Additionally restores 2% health/mana pool per second.
Only steals the first ability

language.displayName: Lightning Storm Can Bounce Twice On Units
description: Will bounce to units it affected already only when there are no other units available
The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, {s:bonus_extra_arrows_angle} degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.

language.displayName: +{s:bonus_AbilityCharges} Holy Persuasion Max Units and Charges
+200/+10 Hand of God Heal/Heal Over Time

description: Stomps the ground, dealing damage to nearby units and reducing their base physical armor by 50%.
Causes the next attack to petrify the enemy, rooting them and dealing 75 damage per second.
Allied heroes within 1200 range of Centaur gain the Return Damage aspect of Retaliate.
Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
language.lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
notes: Grants 125 gold if destroyed by an enemy hero.
Affects the closest enemy unit with strikes from Zeus's current level of Lightning Bolt.
Towers and creeps do half damage to the Nimbus.

description: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after 0.3 seconds. Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.
language.lore: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...
notes: Does not interrupt channeling spells upon rooting.

description: Dark Willow sends her pet wisp to roam around an ally for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
language.lore: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.

description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after %max_damage_duration% seconds.
language.lore: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.
language.aghanimDescription: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.
notes: Disjoints projectiles upon cast.
Grants phased movement.
Spells which require vision cannot affect Dark Willow in the Shadow Realm.

description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
language.lore: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...
language.shardDescription: Cursed Crown creates 4 brambles in a 175 radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces stun delay by 1 second.

description: Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with 50%% additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land.
Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.
During Rolling Thunder, Shield Crash cooldown is reduced.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: Where his ancestors sought only refuge, the Pangolier saw opportunity...
notes: Enemies can be stunned multiple times per use, but cannot be affected a subsequent time until the previous stun duration ends.
If Pangolier is disabled while rolling, he will continue to stun and knock enemies that come within range.

description: Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.
Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.
language.lore: The Pangolier's blade is even nimbler than his tongue.
notes: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Swashbuckle attacks.
Casting Swashbuckle during Rolling Thunder ends Rolling Thunder.

description: Pangolier reads his enemies perfectly, deftly slipping his blade past defenses. Each attack has a chance to negate enemy armor and slow the target for a duration, activating after a short delay.
language.lore: These fools know nothing of real armor...
notes: Does not proc when attacking Roshan or buildings.

language.displayName: --0.10s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 18s
description: Triggers if Focus Fired unit dies, regardless of killer.
Halt!
language.lore: Donté Panlin stops when he pleases.

description: Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains an all damage shield for a short time.
Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.
Shield Crash cooldown during Rolling Thunder is decreased.
language.lore: Only in the midst of his enemies does the Pangolier truly thrive.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero.

description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
language.lore: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.
language.shardDescription: Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by %shard_bonus_damage%.

description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra 50.0% damage.
language.lore: A favorite from her collection, Beadie crafted Ol' Rackatee as her first line of defense when she ventured into the Outlands.
language.shardDescription: Causes Scatterblast to deal extra damage as well as stun and knockback enemy units in the point blank range.

description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 5.5 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.
language.lore: Little did Beadie know when she adopted Mortimer, dragon toads--which aren't even toads at all--share more than just a name with their distant draconic cousins.
notes: Can be cancelled by pressing Stop, Hold Position, or using another ability.
Has a minimum travel time of 0.8 and maximum travel time of 2.0.

description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.
language.lore: With the help of a secret mixture that pairs Beadie's baking skills with her passion for black powder, these battle biscuits pack a punch.
notes: The cookie projectile has a speed of 1100.
language.shardDescription: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, getting increased jump range and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does 50 impact damage to the landing destination.

description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3.0 seconds.
notes: Snapfire earns the creep's bounty after it has been spat out and died.

description: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit that slows and applies damage over time. Spit Out has a no minimum launch range.
Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire 6 fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.
language.lore: Beadie constantly tinkers with a design she first dreamed up plotting an exodus from her old gang.
notes: Sets base attack time to 1.0s for the duration.
Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on Lil' Shredder attacks.

description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.
language.lore: The Ascended were chosen sons of Ashkavor, granted immense power by the bonds forged between their own souls and those they were charged with protecting. In the years that followed the ruination of his kin, Grimstroke discovered much more sinister applications for the binding rituals...
notes: If bound to another unit, affected units are leashed and prevented from blinking.
Provides vision of both leashed units.

description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.
language.lore: There isn't a warrior alive who can stand unmoved by the sting of Mars' rebuke.
notes: Attack modifiers have a chance to proc on God's Rebuke attacks.

language.displayName: +6% Arc Lightning Current Health As Damage

description: A second Soul Assumption is launched towards a random enemy unit within the cast range, prioritizing Heroes.
Moves the Astral Spirit to target location.
Instead of being slowed, all enemy units within 900 range have the current level of Wraithfire Blast cast on them when Reincarnation triggers.

Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, granting phased movement, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs 70% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.
language.lore: Only the very foolish dare to fight fair with the god of war.
language.aghanimDescription: Creates 4 invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage, knock back and slow approaching enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.
notes: Redirect only works if the projectile targets are in a cone behind Mars or within 100 range of him.

description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.
language.lore: The legendary Spear of Mars still glows with the heat of the forge god's fires.
notes: Spear of Mars can hit invisible units and reveals them if they are stunned.
Spear of Mars will only pin a unit to cliffs onto elevated areas, otherwise it will push them off onto lower ground.
language.shardDescription: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.
language.lore: The long-dead members of the Ash Legion, assembled from the finest warriors to ever test the might of Mars, still revel in the thrill of combat, gladly beholden to the hand that fell them for as long as he so commands.

language.displayName: Acid Spray grants armor to allies
Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited
description: Lasts 1.5 seconds.
Any attack on enemy covered in tar will send another arrow into a random enemy within Clinkz's attack range.

language.displayName: -30s Call Down Cooldown and Global Range

description: Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 90 second cooldown. Creates 2 visible Sun Strikes within 160-200 range of each enemy hero.
Spawns 3 Ghostships, 3.5 seconds apart, towards the target location.

language.displayName: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

description: Additional enemy units within cast range are also targeted by Adaptive Strike.

language.displayName: +100 Hunter In The Night Attack Speed
Arena Of Blood Grants Team +180 HP Regen

description: After blinking, an uncontrollable illusion is created at Anti-Mage's original location.  Deals {s:outgoing_damage}% less damage, takes {s:incoming_damage}% damage, and lasts {s:illusion_duration} seconds.
Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot.
While tethered to a friendly Hero, each time that Hero attacks, Io will attack the same target automatically.

language.displayName: +1 Bonus Armor per Culling Blade Stack

description: Bane gains attack speed equal to the attack speed stolen for the duration of Enfeeble.
Enemies hit by Waveform are also instantly attacked by Morphling.
Puck instantly attacks all enemies while affected by Dream Coil, every {s:value} seconds.

language.displayName: Static Link Steals 1 Armor per Second
Tricks of the Trade Applies a Basic Dispel
description: Can be cast when rooted or leashed

language.displayName: 500 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning
description: Every 500 distance travelled in Ball Lightning creates a Static Remnant.
While tethered to a friendly Hero, that Hero gains its Aghanim's Scepter ability upgrades for the duration.
Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.
language.lore: Even enemies can share in Tiny's arbor ardor.
language.shardDescription: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by %bonus_bonus_damage%.

description: Applies a basic dispel to Templar Assassin.
Enemies hit by the spill of Psi Blades have their movement speed slowed by 100% for 1.0 second.

language.displayName: +4 Kraken Shell Damage Block per Anchor Smash Kill
description: Retroactively counts any hero who died with Anchor Smash debuff.

language.displayName: +6 Max / +1 Hero Attack Reactive Armor Stacks

description: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.
Walrus Punch gains a chance to be triggered on normal attacks, independent of mana cost or cooldown.
The target of False Promise also becomes invisible for the duration (with a 0.6 second fade time).

language.displayName: Noxious Plague Aura reduces 200 Attack Speed

description: The slow is still applied for the same duration.

Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength.
Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
language.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.
notes: Projectile moves at 1150 speed.
language.shardDescription: Increases bonus Strength.

description: Grants a 20% chance to avoid damage entirely. Disabled by break.
Toss can target the ground as well as enemy units.
Creates an additional ring of 7 soldiers at {s:value} range from the center.
A second Wall of Replica is created 600 units behind the first wall.  Illusions are independent for each Wall.

language.displayName: Soul Catcher Creates 2 Illusion On Death
Earthbind grants True Strike on Targets

description: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area. The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly. After 6.0 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
notes: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispels.

description: Pierces Spell Immunity.
Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
language.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

description: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every 4s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
language.lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.
language.shardDescription: Reduces Hawk cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s and summons an additional Hawk.

description: Triggers an existing Ink Swell.
In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.
language.lore: Not even Huskar's own flesh can contain the unending expansion of his life force.
language.shardDescription: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
language.lore: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

description: Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.
The spell can be activated by spending health to decrease the remaining cooldown of all other abilities. Casting Bad Juju temporarily increases its health cost.
language.lore: Each invocation of the Nothl realm helps it further permeate the surroundings of our own.
language.aghanimDescription: Bad Juju also reduces item cooldowns.

description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing they receive.
If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes will cancel the teleport.
language.lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to drastically slow their attack speed and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.
language.lore: The Pangolier's blade is guided more often by whim than reason.

description: Spirit Bear absorbs 30% of the damage dealt to Lone Druid.
Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
language.lore: Sylla is emboldened by the presence of his companion, his vitality replenished with each swipe of the Spirit Bear's claws.
language.aghanimDescription:
Lone Druid severs his link to his Spirit Bear, and connects to the target allied hero, sharing the Spirit Link bonuses with them for 20s. Armor sharing and attack speed are increased by 35. Damage done by the ally heals Lone Druid, as well as the other way around.

 The Spirit Bear is feared for the duration of the transformation, unless he has his own Aghanim's Scepter.

description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.
language.lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

description: Grants you bonus attack speed for a limited number of attacks, draining a percentage of mana for each hit. Costs a percentage of current health to cast. Lasts up to 15 seconds or when the attack count is consumed.
Allied Aura. Causes all nearby ally attacks to slow enemy movement speed.
Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.
language.lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.
language.shardDescription: Counterspell passively grants an aura that reduces enemy spell damage. The reduction is stronger in close range.

description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
language.lore: Though he would not claim to 'know' them, Ezalor holds an uncanny influence over many powerful creatures always willing to come to his aid.
notes: Ignus Fatuus applies a non-interrupting pull towards it on all enemies within the radius.

description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.
language.lore: So you gonna need that, or...?
language.shardDescription: Ransack now has a 30% chance on hit to apply a Geostrike debuff, slowing enemies by 20% and dealing 20 DPS for 4 seconds. Instances from multiple Meepos stack.

description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.
language.lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.
language.lore: Not every magus can be a Grand Magus...

description: Passively slows the attack speed of all enemies within 350 radius. Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5 seconds.
language.lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.
notes: Affects attacks from allied heroes, Tusk or any of his units.

description: Causes affected enemies to deal less spell damage for a duration.
language.lore: When faced with the pit of sacrifice, Purist's resilience to magic was tested and affirmed.

description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts 2x longer and deals 250 damage per second.
language.lore: Mind the cold...
language.aghanimDescription: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of  in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

description: Causes all enemy heroes in a 800 radius to take 25 damage per second and - 100 Health/Lifesteal Regeneration for 5 seconds.
language.lore: Ice Age Lore

description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
language.lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.
language.shardDescription: Increases Aether Remnant watch range and only pulls enemy hero units. Other units take 0 damage every 0s that they are in the remnant's path, but the remnant is not destroyed. Decreases cooldown to 17.0 15.0 13.0 11.0s.

description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.
language.lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.
notes: Astral Step attacks do not cleave.
language.shardDescription: Void Spirits attacks have a 0 Chance, and Non-Ult Spells a 0% Chance to put a Void Mark on the Enemy.

description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a physical attack damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The barrier gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits. The barrier only protects against attacks.
language.lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.
language.aghanimDescription: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain 2 charges.

description: Attacks made with Astral Step deal a critical strike.

Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the rock splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

Rock Throw increases stacks of Uproar for each hero hit.
language.lore: AGAIN WITH THE ROCKS!

language.displayName: Beast dispels himself when activating Uproar

description: Throw a snowball at an ally or enemy.
language.lore: Hand crafted at the perfect temperature.

description: Construct a jolly snowman.
language.lore: He'll stay friends as long as he can.

description: Give any tree a delightfully seasonal touch.
language.lore: Festive trappings for even the bloodiest of battlefields.

description: Shoot a firework into the air.
language.lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

description: Throw a snowball at an enemy, damaging and stunning all enemy units around it.
Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
language.lore: Enjoy a bold, rocky center with a packed-ice crust!

description: Summons a snowman that taunts nearby enemies.
Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
language.lore: He's irresistibly friendly!

description: Decorate a tree with blinking lights that damage nearby enemies.
Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
language.lore: Who knew a few twinkling lights could be so deadly?

description: Summon a friendly penguin who slides around. Each time a hero bumps the penguin, it gains speed and lasts a bit longer.
language.lore: Nothing gets age-old enemies to set aside their differences quite like a penguin to play with.
notes: Your team's penguins will pass through enemy heroes that you don't have vision of.

description: Fires a global range firework that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies, blinding them, and providing vision for 10 seconds.
Note: All Frosthaven consumables have a shared cooldown.
language.lore: There's nothing more festive than explosions!

description: No one can resist the sky snake's goofy charms.
Plant your personal battle standard to mark this battleground as yours!
Lay down some savage beats.
Dig around the map for buried treasure!
He'll fling filth at your enemies so you don't have to.
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!
Associated ability not drafted, have some gold!

Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases as the level goes up.
language.lore: Sadron's Protracted Frisson.
notes: The freeze stun only triggers on damage greater than 10.0 after reductions.

description: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies, and slows Invoker as well based on the level.
language.lore: Myrault's Hinder-Gast.
notes: The slow effect does not work on Debuff Immune enemies.

description: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level and holds enemies in the air for a duration.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
language.lore: Claws of Tornarus.
notes: Units are invulnerable while affected by Tornado, and the damage is dealt when landing.

description: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana. Deals damage for each point of mana drained. If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.
language.lore: Endoleon's Malevolent Perturbation.
notes: Will not affect cycloned units (Tornado or Eul's Scepter of Divinity).

description: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed and their damage.
language.lore: Gaster's Mandate of Impetuous Strife.

description: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.
language.lore: Harlek's Incantation of Incineration.
language.aghanimDescription: Adds Cataclysm. Launched when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 100 second cooldown. Creates 0 visible Sun Strikes within 160-200 range of each enemy hero.
notes: Gives vision of the target area before the strike.
Invoker gains experience with kills made from Sun Strike, even if made from outside of experience range.

description: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes.
language.lore: Culween's Most Cunning Fabrications.
notes: Casting this ability will replace currently summoned Forged Spirits.

description: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage and rolling further based on the level. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time.
language.lore: Tarak's Descent of Fire.
notes: Deals main damage to enemy units under meteor every 0.5 seconds and burns enemies for smaller damage over 3.0 seconds.
The meteor moves at a speed of 300.
language.shardDescription: Causes 1 extra Chaos Meteors to land alongside the primary cast at slight angles. Reduces cooldown by %shard_cooldown_reduction% seconds.

description: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies and deals damage each second.
language.lore: Killing Wall of Koryx.
notes: The slow will still affect Debuff Immune enemies if their debuff immunity was created after being affected by Ice Wall.

description: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration then disarm their attacks for a duration.
language.lore: Buluphont's Aureal Incapacitator.

description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
language.lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

description: Creates a spectral nemesis to haunt a single visible enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places with any haunting illusion.
Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They ignore terrain.
language.lore: With great focus of will, Mercurial can sometimes limit the extent of her division.

description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95%% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
language.lore: No dark creation is beyond the skill of the master's hand.

description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 1.5 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 200 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
language.lore: In reward for her service, Lanaya has been granted access to secrets that unlock new techniques for her psionic gifts.

description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
language.lore: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.
notes: Dawnbreaker travels at a rate of 215 for the duration of the ability and takes a brief 0.2s to recover after the final strike.
Celestial Hammer or Solar Guardian cannot be cast during the combo.
Cleave does not work with this ability.
Can be self-cast to move forward
language.shardDescription: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by 0 down to a minimum of 215.

description: Dawnbreaker recalls her hammer, pulling them together so they meet in the middle.

CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 350 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
language.lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.
language.aghanimDescription: Reduces the channel time and increases the healing and total duration of Solar Guardian's air time. Causes allies in the destination area to have evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early. While airborne, the landing point of Solar Guardian can be moved at a speed of 200.
notes: Pulse interval is 0.5s.
Total duration flight duration is 1.7 seconds of channel time + 0.8 of flight time.
Cannot be cast without the Hammer.
Healing does not affect Dawnbreaker herself.

description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for 2 seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
language.lore: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.
notes: The hammer damages enemies both when thrown and when returning to Dawnbreaker.
Dawnbreaker's Converge movement distance is capped at the ability's cast range.
Starbreaker or Solar Guardian cannot be cast while the Hammer is out.

description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within 650 units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for 50% of the amount.
language.lore: Diminished in power without access to the Children's replenishing light, Valora can still recharge herself and her allies by creating order from the chaos which resides within each fight.
notes: Luminosity Heal is considered a lifesteal and increased by sources of Lifesteal Amplification.

description: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

language.displayName: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.
language.lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

description: Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.
Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
language.lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.
notes: The phantom falls off if the target becomes invisible or spell immune.
The phantom will return if the target dies during the latch.

description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 5 seconds, or when manually triggered, it applies damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
language.lore: Now that the rise of the ink tide no longer threatens to overwhelm Grimstroke, its tendrils of power are never far from his hand.
language.shardDescription:
Causes Ink Swell to deal 30 more damage and heal the target for 30 of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

language.displayName: +700 Range and Ground Target Stifling Dagger
